ing: 1 (11 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
1 (4 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained
1 red bell pepper, seeded and diced
des: "This salsa is quick and easy to make. It's colorful and most important, it's delicious! Whenever I take it to a party, I bring the recipe along because I'm always asked for it. Serve with tortilla chips; colored ones are fun!"
ins: Mix together corn, olives, tomatoes, onion, red pepper, and jalapeno pepper in a large bowl. Gently fold in diced avocado, olive oil, lime juice, and salt.
